explanation: Funds are required due to errors in recording retroactive adjustments in actual PCS moves Â© from January through July caused by a broken Integrated Personnel and Pay System - Army (IPPS-A) data link. These errors drive an increase of ~13,500 permanent change of station moves (~200 training moves, ~8,400 operational moves, and ~4,900 rotational moves).
